content: *a cute and flowery granny square pattern which can be worked up in any yarn and hook size * **pattern notes** this is a tutorial style pattern for a square crochet motif **skill level** *easy* a basic crochet square with an intermediate stitches which is explained in full **yarn** any **needles/hook** recommended hook for yarn **materials** yarn needle **size** dependant on yarn used **gauge** n/a **pattern includes ** * a photo tutorial style pattern * a written pattern at the end of the tutorial **pattern written in ** uk terms us translations given uk terms us terms **translations** french danish swedish german see link below for translation links **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 1 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **love to share ** #cherryheart 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
